channel.title: [SOLVED]Chat Text Color
channel.description:
I was just wondering is it possible to change the chat color? Like the default is blue, how would i be able to change that to a color? Will it use HTML color codes or something else.
If anyone knows please give me a example where to change it.
Thanks.

item.title: [SOLVED]Chat Text Color
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok, i was thinking it was in player.java under,

protected void appendPlayerChatText(stream str) { str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); str.writeWordBigEndian(((chatTextColor&0xFF) << 8) + (chatTextEffects&0xFF)); str.writeByte(playerRights); str.writeByteC(chatTextSize); str.writeBytes_reverse(chatText, chatTextSize, 0); }

Must be wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED]Chat Text Color

item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

it is possible, and its in client.java, but i dont remember the place off the top of my headâ€¦ just look for something that has to do with chat or something :s
